title: AB InBev logo
content:
I didn't see anyone talking about the new logo for the world's largest brewing company yet.  
Any thoughts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019053117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_abinbev_6142.gif)
author: ChuckGroth

comments.content:
it hurts to look at it.

that's not the best criticism, i know. rather, it's uninspired with the WEAK typography and the image, like Tiffany said, looks like it's either clip art from the 80s or clip art from the 80s LIVETRACED, it makes me feel sad.

I'm loving the drop shadow on the type.

Who are Abigail and Beverley? An eagle with a dual personality, maybe.

Why is Ab in Bev? I assume Bev likes Ab in her?

penn
but it does scare the birds away...
